subject: Re: FW: Flock Map Changes
body:

You bet!


	
 
Caroline Fraher
Regional Account Executive II

On Tue, Feb 11, 2025 at 10:13?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Good morning,

	 

	Can you take a look at the proposed changes below and have your guy update the map.  We want to keep clearing things out and updating it as we go so its easier to view.  The Captain is presenting this to the Chief soon, so if everything other then what is actually going to be deployed is removed that is our preference.  

	
	Derek

	 

	https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Eugene, OR 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: DEWITT Derek A 
	Sent: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 9:25 AM
	To: WILLIAMS Jeremy K <JWilliams@eugene-or.gov JWilliams@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: EVANS Kyle B <KBEvans@eugene-or.gov KBEvans@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: RE: Flock Map Changes

	 

	Those all look fine to me for the most part.

	 

	Although I would cut camera 09 as its in a neighborhood and we have coverage further down the street that would be duplicative.  

	 

	These cameras are being kept, but need moved when possible.

	 

	Move camera #82 MLK near leo Harris Pkwy -----  MLK watching westbound, just past I-5 when it comes into Eugene.

	 

	Move camera #80 down two blocks.  Capturing if the vehicle turns onto 6th, or continues towards franklin.

	 

	Move camera #68.  Coburg Road at N Game Farm road SB as they hit the intersection.

	 

	https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Eugene, OR 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+OR+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: WILLIAMS Jeremy K <JWilliams@eugene-or.gov JWilliams@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 7:09 AM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: EVANS Kyle B <KBEvans@eugene-or.gov KBEvans@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Flock Map Changes

	 

	Derek, can you take a look at the list Sgt. Evans and I worked up for the preliminary cut of 15 cameras?  We also have three additional cameras highlighted we�d like to re-allocate to areas with poor coverage, which are bolded at the bottom.  

	 

	Let us know how this looks to you.

	 

	Jeremy
